output_questions.question: Box with margin
output_questions.explanation: The div has 20px of margin on all sides, creating space outside the box.

output_questions.question: Padded text
output_questions.explanation: The paragraph has 15px of padding on all sides, creating space inside the border.

output_questions.question: Vertical margin
output_questions.explanation: The div has 30px margin above and 10px below.

output_questions.question: Indented text
output_questions.explanation: The paragraph's text is indented with 40px of left padding.

output_questions.question: Centered box
output_questions.output: Centered box
output_questions.explanation: Setting left/right margins to auto with a fixed width centers the div horizontally.

output_questions.question: Top padding
output_questions.explanation: The div has 30px of padding at the top, increasing the space inside the top border.

output_questions.question: Padding values
output_questions.explanation: Padding order: top 5px, right 10px, bottom 15px, left 20px (clockwise).

output_questions.question: Bottom margin
output_questions.explanation: The div has 40px of margin below it.

output_questions.question: Right padding
output_questions.explanation: The paragraph has 25px of padding on the right side.

output_questions.question: No margin or padding
output_questions.output: No margin or padding
output_questions.explanation: The div has no margin or padding at all.

output_questions.question: Left margin
output_questions.explanation: The div is pushed 60px from the left edge.

output_questions.question: Bottom padding
output_questions.explanation: The paragraph has 12px of padding at the bottom.
